data.title: Great Custard...and Awesome Breakfast Too!
data.text:
Was recommended to go here by our hotel staff.   Breakfast was great, very plentiful, and priced great too!

Had Abbot's Custard after...delicious...  :)

data.title: Quick breakfast
data.text: Staying at the Radisson a block away, wanted a quick easy breakfast. This place was recommended by hotel. Tasty, good variety and very inexpensive. My 15 year old son even asked if he could have a burger for breakfast, no problem. it also looked and was good. Happy we went and would go again if we were staying there.

data.title: Great Breakfast for a great price!
data.text: I was in Rochester, staying downtown @ the Radisson Riverside  while my daughter was at a camp south of the city. I did not want to have the big breakfast buffet at my hotel, or pay the price for it for one person. One half block away was this little gem. Abbott's was perfect---great hearty breakfast for very reasonable  prices. Very simple, down-home design made this diner very welcoming. The owner / manager was very hospitable and made me feel like I was 'home'. For basically 5$, I got bacon, eggs, toast and orange juice...perfectly done and filling for one. There were some really 'interesting' characters in there, that I assume frequented the place...all were taken care of kindly and respectfully. Would definitely come back for the good food and great service and excellent prices.

data.title: 1st visit last year good, this one not so good.
data.text:
Its tough finding coffee and breakfast in downtown Rochester in the morning. Last year we found this location and thought it was pretty good. This time....not good.

We ordered corned beef hash and eggs. The hash was poured out of a can, not hot and very watery. Couldn't finish it. If you go, don't order this dish !

data.title: Yum!  Best custard served in town!
data.text: Abbott's serves the very best custard ice cream around and my favorite is chocolate almond!  I always get a sundae with chocolate almond ice cream with the works. Good sized portions and great pricing too for what you get.

data.title: Ice cream to die for
data.text:
This only sells ice cream but if it's the last thing you do on earth you must have an Abbotts ice cream.  It is the best in the world.
We have sat there in the rain, in the wind and the snow eating our ice creams.
As they say the proof is in the eating.
The only problem is is that there are only 2 outlets in Rochester and a couple of places in Buffalo selling this divine stuff.

data.title: This IS your father's soft-serve!
data.text: If you come from a place where frozen custard isn't available or you think it's the same thing as soft-serve ice cream, you owe it to yourself to have a cone or cup of vanilla frozen custard at Abbott's. I don't know anything about their food menu, so I can't recommend a meal. But at least once on your visit to Rochester you should stop in at an Abbott's and get a treat. Maybe the second time you can try a different flavor or get a sundae, but try the basic vanilla first. Some locations may be open only during the summer, but the St. Paul Street store appears to be a year-round operation.

data.title: Tasty summer dessert!
data.text: Friendly staff, delicious custard, and quite a few choices.  A pleasant summer stop!  Would definitely go again!

data.title: Wonderful as always
data.text: it is a bit of a wait in line but well worth it.  Children and adults enjoyed the ice cream.  We all walked the pier and had our ice cream, great experience.

data.title: The best
data.text: This is the best frozen custard you will ever have! Best part about summer is Abbotts! I love the chocolate in a dish but this time I had a hot fudge sundae with chocolate and it was excellent.

data.title: Can't get better ice cream anywhere!
data.text:
We have an ice cream place near our home, but I always look forward to going to Abbott's when we get to Rochester. You cannot beat the homemade, soft, packed with yummy things ice cream! My favorite is the Chocolate Almond cone. I swear there is a 1/2 cup of almonds in my medium cone!! Tasty deliciousness!!
My husband knows how to keep me happy by taking me now and then! It's one of our indulgences! You should make it yours too!

data.title: Tradition Rules
data.text: Everyone enjoys a visit to Abbott's for the best frozen custard ever.  Try the chocolate almond for a special treat, and carry it down to Charlotte Beach Park to watch the waves as you eat it, cone or dish.  If it is hot out, I recommend the dish and two spoons to share!

data.title: Yum!
data.text: A total rochester treat! Their vanilla custard is the best! Ice cream cake is soon good. Love going to the Bushnells Basin location and sitting by the canal!

data.title: Long lines indicate you're in for a treat
data.text:
a home town favorite
Smooth & creamy 👄 high in fat low in self restraint
A must visit when in town worth the drive in the heart of Charlotte Beach.....

data.title: THREE WORDS....
data.text: Chocolate Almond Custard.  You'll never forget it - I promise!!  Abbott's has perfected custard, and there's no need for atmosphere - most of them are small (no tables) or outdoor window service (just walk around).  Best use of calories you'll find!

data.title: Yummy Ice Cream
data.text: On my recent visit to Rochester New York to see my sister - and after a fun day of hanging out - we went to Abbots for ice cream - it was the best and the offerings were countless - loved eatting outside.

data.title: Toppings!
data.text: On the first day of my first ever visit to Rochester I was introduced to Abbotts. I asked for a single scoop with one topping.... It was enormous!  I walked along the waterfront for ages and still couldn't get to the end of it, pretty good value and absolutely delicious. I especially like the idea of a free bottle of water with each cone.

data.title: Awesome
data.text: We always try to stop at Abbott's when in the Rochester area.  Never disappointed.  We went to the Spencerport location this time.

data.title: Yummy
data.text: Long lines but always worth the wait. I love everything at Abbott's. My favorite...their Turtle...frozen custard, fudge, peanuts all rolled into one and covered in chocolate....YUM!

data.title: The best Custard ever
data.text: I grew up in Rochester and can tell you that the quality of Abbott's has never wavered. DELICIOUS and ADDICTING!
